mapper.select: SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.getSurveyTypeList */ cd_id , cd , cd_nm FROM co_code_mst WHERE CD_ID = 'SURVEY_TYPE' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND DPTH > 2 ORDER BY lft_val

SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyList */ SRV_SEQ ,TYPE_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD = A.TYPE_CD) AS TYPE_NM ,TITL ,RSPN_MM ,CNTN ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_IP ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_IP ,MOD_DTM ,MSR_STND_CD ,MSR_YN FROM SV_MST A
ORDER BY SRV_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyListCnt*/ COUNT(SRV_SEQ) FROM SV_MST A

choose.when: AND ( INSTR(A.REG_ID , #{q} ) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(NAME , #{q}) > 0) )
AND ( INSTR(MOD_ID , #{q} ) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(NAME , #{q}) > 0) )
choose.otherwise: AND ( INSTR(TITL , #{q} ) > 0 OR INSTR(REG_ID , #{q} ) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID AND INSTR(NAME , #{q}) > 0) OR INSTR(MOD_ID , #{q} ) > 0 OR EXISTS(SELECT 'x' FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID AND INSTR(NAME , #{q}) > 0) )

mapper.select: select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyDtl */ srv_seq ,type_cd ,titl ,rspn_mm ,cntn ,exps_yn ,msr_stnd_cd ,msr_yn , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.reg_id) AS REG_NAME ,reg_id ,reg_dtm , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.mod_id) AS MOD_NAME ,mod_id ,mod_dtm from sv_mst A where srv_seq = #{detailsKey}

SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyQstnDtlList */ cd_id , cd , cd_nm , qstn_seq , ctgry_cd , srv_type_cd , parnt_qstn_seq , case when dpth is null then 0 else dpth end dpth , qstn_nm , ncs_yn , qstn_ord , exmpl_cnt , qstn_grp_ord , qstn_cnt FROM ( SELECT cd_id , cd , cd_nm , b.qstn_seq , b.ctgry_cd , b.srv_type_cd , b.parnt_qstn_seq , b.dpth , b.qstn_nm , b.ncs_yn , b.qstn_ord , (select count(*) from sv_exmpl_dtl where qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq) as exmpl_cnt , case when @grp = binary b.ctgry_cd then @rownum:=@rownum + 1 else @rownum :=1 end as qstn_grp_ord , (@grp := ctgry_cd) as dum , (select count(*) from sv_qstn_dtl c where c.srv_seq = #{detailsKey} and c.parnt_qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq ) as qstn_cnt FROM co_code_mst a left join (select * from sv_qstn_dtl where srv_seq = #{detailsKey}) b on a.cd = b.ctgry_cd , (select @rownum:=0, @grp:='') r WHERE a.CD_ID = 'SURVEY_TYPE' AND a.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.DPTH > 2 ORDER BY lft_val , qstn_ord ) T

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyExmplDtlList */ exmpl_seq ,qstn_seq ,exmpl_nm ,exmpl_ord ,next_no ,reg_id ,reg_dtm ,mod_id ,mod_dtm from sv_exmpl_dtl where qstn_seq = #{qstnSeq} order by qstn_seq asc, exmpl_ord asc

SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyQstnTypeDtlList */ cd_id , cd , cd_nm , parent_cd_nm , qstn_seq , ctgry_cd , srv_type_cd , parnt_qstn_seq , case when dpth is null then 0 else dpth end dpth , qstn_nm , ncs_yn , qstn_ord , exmpl_cnt , qstn_grp_ord , qstn_cnt , srv_type_nm FROM ( SELECT cd_id , cd , cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id = 'SURVEY_TYPE' and cd = left(a.cd,5)) as parent_cd_nm , b.qstn_seq , b.ctgry_cd , b.srv_type_cd , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id = 'QUESTION_TYPE' and cd = b.srv_type_cd) as srv_type_nm , b.parnt_qstn_seq , b.dpth , b.qstn_nm , b.ncs_yn , b.qstn_ord , (select count(*) from sv_exmpl_dtl where qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq) as exmpl_cnt , case when @grp = binary b.ctgry_cd then @rownum:=@rownum + 1 else @rownum :=1 end as qstn_grp_ord , (@grp := ctgry_cd) as dum , (select count(*) from sv_qstn_dtl c where c.srv_seq = #{detailsKey} and c.parnt_qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq ) as qstn_cnt FROM co_code_mst a left join (select * from sv_qstn_dtl where srv_seq = #{detailsKey} AND ctgry_cd !='EDU05') b on a.cd = b.ctgry_cd , (select @rownum:=0, @grp:='') r
WHERE a.CD_ID = 'SURVEY_TYPE' AND a.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.DPTH > 3 AND LEFT(CD,3) = #{typeCd} AND ctgry_cd !='EDU05'
WHERE a.CD_ID = 'SURVEY_TYPE' AND a.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.DPTH > 2 AND LEFT(CD,3) = #{typeCd} AND ctgry_cd !='EDU05'
ORDER BY lft_val , qstn_ord ) T

SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyIsttrQstnTypeDtlList */ cd_id , cd , cd_nm , qstn_seq , ctgry_cd , srv_type_cd , parnt_qstn_seq , case when dpth is null then 0 else dpth end dpth , qstn_nm , ncs_yn , qstn_ord , exmpl_cnt , qstn_grp_ord , qstn_cnt , srv_type_nm , isttr_seq , isttr_name
FROM ( SELECT cd_id , cd , cd_nm , b.qstn_seq , b.ctgry_cd , b.srv_type_cd , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id = 'QUESTION_TYPE' and cd = b.srv_type_cd) as srv_type_nm , b.parnt_qstn_seq , b.dpth , b.qstn_nm , b.ncs_yn , b.qstn_ord , (select count(*) from sv_exmpl_dtl where qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq) as exmpl_cnt , case when @grp = binary b.ctgry_cd then @rownum:=@rownum + 1 else @rownum :=1 end as qstn_grp_ord , (@grp := ctgry_cd) as dum , (select count(*) from sv_qstn_dtl c where c.srv_seq = #{detailsKey} and c.parnt_qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq ) as qstn_cnt , b.isttr_seq , b.isttr_name FROM co_code_mst a left join ( select b.isttr_seq ,(select name from cp_isttr_mst where isttr_seq = b.isttr_seq) as isttr_name , a.srv_seq , c.qstn_seq , c.ctgry_cd , c.srv_type_cd , c.parnt_qstn_seq , c.dpth , c.qstn_nm , c.ncs_yn , c.qstn_ord from ed_edctn_episd_mst a inner join ed_edctn_isttr_rel b on a.episd_seq= b.episd_seq inner join sv_qstn_dtl c on a.srv_seq = c.srv_seq where a.episd_seq = #{episdSeq} and a.srv_seq = #{detailsKey} and c.ctgry_cd ='EDU05' ) b on a.cd = b.ctgry_cd , (select @rownum:=0, @grp:='') r WHERE a.CD_ID = 'SURVEY_TYPE' AND a.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.DPTH > 2 AND LEFT(CD,3) = #{typeCd} AND b.qstn_seq is not null ORDER BY lft_val , qstn_ord ) T

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyExmplAnswerDtlList */ a.exmpl_seq ,a.qstn_seq ,a.exmpl_nm ,a.exmpl_ord ,a.next_no ,a.reg_id ,a.reg_dtm ,a.mod_id ,a.mod_dtm , (select count(svmd.exmpl_seq) from sv_rspn_mst svm inner join sv_mtlcc_rspn_dtl svmd on svm.srv_rspn_seq = svmd.srv_rspn_seq where svm.srv_rspn_seq = #{srvRspnSeq} and svmd.exmpl_seq = a.exmpl_seq) as win_answer , (select sbjct_rply from sv_rspn_mst svm inner join sv_sbjct_rspn_dtl svsd on svm.srv_rspn_seq = svsd.srv_rspn_seq where svm.srv_rspn_seq = #{srvRspnSeq} and svsd.qstn_seq = a.qstn_seq) as win_answer_text from sv_exmpl_dtl a inner join sv_qstn_dtl b on a.qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq where a.qstn_seq = #{qstnSeq} order by a.qstn_seq asc, a.exmpl_ord asc

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyExmplEduDtlList */ a.exmpl_seq ,a.qstn_seq ,a.exmpl_nm ,a.exmpl_ord ,a.next_no ,a.reg_id ,a.reg_dtm ,a.mod_id ,a.mod_dtm , (select count(svmd.exmpl_seq) from sv_rspn_mst svm inner join sv_mtlcc_rspn_dtl svmd on svm.srv_rspn_seq = svmd.srv_rspn_seq where rfnc_cd = 'EDU' and rfnc_seq = #{rfncSeq} and svmd.exmpl_seq = a.exmpl_seq) as win_answer , (select group_concat(sbjct_rply) from sv_rspn_mst svm inner join sv_sbjct_rspn_dtl svsd on svm.srv_rspn_seq = svsd.srv_rspn_seq where rfnc_cd = 'EDU' and rfnc_seq = #{rfncSeq} and svsd.qstn_seq = a.qstn_seq) as win_answer_text from sv_exmpl_dtl a inner join sv_qstn_dtl b on a.qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq where a.qstn_seq = #{qstnSeq} order by a.qstn_seq asc, a.exmpl_ord asc

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyIsttrExmplEduDtlList */ a.exmpl_seq ,a.qstn_seq ,a.exmpl_nm ,a.exmpl_ord ,a.next_no ,a.reg_id ,a.reg_dtm ,a.mod_id ,a.mod_dtm , (select count(svmd.exmpl_seq) from sv_rspn_mst svm inner join sv_mtlcc_rspn_dtl svmd on svm.srv_rspn_seq = svmd.srv_rspn_seq where rfnc_cd = 'EDU' and rfnc_seq = #{rfncSeq} and svmd.exmpl_seq = a.exmpl_seq and svmd.isttr_seq = #{isttrSeq}) as win_answer from sv_exmpl_dtl a inner join sv_qstn_dtl b on a.qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq where a.qstn_seq = #{qstnSeq} order by a.qstn_seq asc, a.exmpl_ord asc

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyExmplConDtlList */ a.exmpl_seq ,a.qstn_seq ,a.exmpl_nm ,a.exmpl_ord ,a.next_no ,a.reg_id ,a.reg_dtm ,a.mod_id ,a.mod_dtm , (select count(svmd.exmpl_seq) from sv_rspn_mst svm inner join sv_mtlcc_rspn_dtl svmd on svm.srv_rspn_seq = svmd.srv_rspn_seq where rfnc_cd = 'CON' and rfnc_seq = #{rfncSeq} and svmd.exmpl_seq = a.exmpl_seq) as win_answer , (select sbjct_rply from sv_rspn_mst svm inner join sv_sbjct_rspn_dtl svsd on svm.srv_rspn_seq = svsd.srv_rspn_seq where rfnc_cd = 'CON' and rfnc_seq = #{rfncSeq} and svsd.qstn_seq = a.qstn_seq) as win_answer_text from sv_exmpl_dtl a inner join sv_qstn_dtl b on a.qstn_seq = b.qstn_seq where a.qstn_seq = #{qstnSeq} order by a.qstn_seq asc, a.exmpl_ord asc

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectSurveyConDtl */ a.srv_seq ,a.type_cd ,a.titl ,a.rspn_mm ,a.cntn ,a.exps_yn ,a.msr_stnd_cd ,a.msr_yn ,a.reg_id ,a.reg_dtm ,a.mod_id ,a.mod_dtm from sv_mst a inner join cp_cnstg_rsume_mst b on a.srv_seq = b.srv_seq where b.cnstg_seq = #{detailsKey}

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectApiSurveyDtl */ #{detailsKey} AS kap_seq from sv_mst A where srv_seq IN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SRV_SEQ from ED_EDCTN_EPISD_MST WHERE EDCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY EPISD_YEAR ASC , EPISD_ORD ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS T )

SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.selectApiSurveyQstnDtlList */
SRVY_CD , SRVY_TYPE , CASE WHEN SRVY_TYPE='T' THEN NULL WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD = 'QST05' THEN '5' WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD = 'QST06' THEN '7' WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD = 'QST07' THEN '10' END QSTN_SMRY , QSTN , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST05','QST06','QST07') THEN '1' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_1 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST05','QST06','QST07') THEN '2' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_2 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST05','QST06','QST07') THEN '3' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_3 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST05','QST06','QST07') THEN '4' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_4 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST05','QST06','QST07') THEN '5' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_5 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST06','QST07') THEN '6' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_6 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST06','QST07') THEN '7' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_7 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST07') THEN '8' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_8 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST07') THEN '9' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_9 , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ('QST07') THEN '10' ELSE '' END AS EXMPL_10 FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM , 'AA' AS SRVY_CD , CASE WHEN SRV_TYPE_CD IN ( 'QST03' ,'QST04') THEN 'T' ELSE 'S' END AS SRVY_TYPE , '' AS QSTN_SMRY , QSTN_NM AS QSTN ,(SELECT MAX(SRV_TYPE_CD) AS SRV_TYPE_CD FROM sv_qstn_dtl WHERE SRV_SEQ = A.SRV_SEQ) AS SRV_TYPE_CD FROM sv_qstn_dtl A , (SELECT @rownum:=0) B WHERE A.SRV_SEQ IN ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SRV_SEQ from ED_EDCTN_EPISD_MST WHERE EDCTN_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY EPISD_YEAR ASC , EPISD_ORD ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS T ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN A.SRV_TYPE_CD IN ( 'QST03' ,'QST04') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ASC , A.QSTN_SEQ ASC ) T ORDER BY SRVY_TYPE ASC , ROWNUM ASC

select /* SVASurveyMapper.selectApiRspnSurveyDtl */ (SELECT EDCTN_SEQ FROM ED_EDCTN_EPISD_MST WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}) AS kap_seq , #{detailsKey} AS kap_schd_seq from sv_rspn_mst A where RFNC_CD = 'EDU' AND RFNC_SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND REG_ID = #{regId}

SELECT /* SVASurveyMapper.selectApiSurveyRspnDtlList */ A.REG_ID AS KAP_ID , 0 AS SRVY_SEQ , 'AA' AS SRVY_CD , CASE WHEN B.SRV_TYPE_CD IN ( 'QST03' ,'QST04') THEN 'T' ELSE 'S' END AS SRVY_TYPE , C.EXMPL_ORD AS RPLY FROM SV_RSPN_MST A INNER JOIN SV_QSTN_DTL B ON A.SRV_SEQ = B.SRV_SEQ INNER JOIN SV_EXMPL_DTL C ON B.QSTN_SEQ = C.QSTN_SEQ INNER JOIN SV_MTLCC_RSPN_DTL D ON C.EXMPL_SEQ = D.EXMPL_SEQ AND D.SRV_RSPN_SEQ = A.SRV_RSPN_SEQ WHERE A.RFNC_CD = 'EDU' AND A.RFNC_SEQ = #{detailsKey} AND A.REG_ID = #{regId} ORDER BY CASE WHEN B.SRV_TYPE_CD IN ( 'QST03' ,'QST04') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ASC , B.QSTN_SEQ ASC
